Ohio Revised Code - Section 2921.31, Obstructing official business.

(A) No person, without privilege to do so and with purpose to prevent, obstruct, or delay the performance by a public official of any authorized act within the public official's official capacity, shall do any act that hampers or impedes a public official in the performance of the public official's lawful duties.

(B) Whoever violates this section is guilty of obstructing official business. Except as otherwise provided in this division, obstructing official business is a misdemeanor of the second degree. replies.text:
@michaellee8815 - I used to think the same thing. But, just look around and notice some other things that are also happening, and that are good. 
Trump won by an even wider margin than his first time. 
Every day black people, Latinos, young men and working class people, are leaving the Democratic party. 
Youtubers, like Actual Justice Warrior, Colion Noir, Black Conservative Perspective,  Vince Doa, Decoy voice, Crowder Bits, Joe Rogan, and many others, are gaining in popularity, while the MSM is continuing to lose in the ratings.
Look at the Trump hating late night talk show hosts and where they're going, while Gutfeld is increasing in the ratings. 
We've got Scott Jennings, and a gay dude whose opposed to transgender surgeries on kids and giving transgender medications to kids, and CNN hates both of them.
The S.C.O.T.U.S. is giving decisions favorable to Trump. 
NATO is finally paying its fair amount, not just 2%, but 5%.
More money, than ever before, is flowing into the U.S. Treasury. 
The Southern border is closed.
Illegal crossings are down to zero.
In the U.K. people are rebelling against their very Liberal governments.
In Britain, over 2,000  marched with British flags, and they were yelling about how much they loved Trump. Why did they do that? Because Trump said that you should be proud of your country, and your traditions. 
I use to have the same mindset that you have. 3 years ago I would've said that what I'm seeing in America, and around the world, would be impossible. But I was wrong. It's ALL changing, and in a good way.

replies.author: @willaustin2577
replies.text: @Sink201 - No, now is not the time to grab your guns and retreat into your bunker. Now is the time to press forward. The S.C.O.T.U.S. is making more 2A friendly judgements, than they ever have in history. Suppressors are no longer considered weapons. Pro 2A Youtubers, like Armed Scholar and Colion Noir, are gaining in popularity. More Americans, like women, black Americans, Latino Americans and Asian Americans are buying guns, and getting their CCWs, in greater numbers than ever before in American history. Why are they doing that? Because they've realized that criminals don't care about the color of your skin, and certainly not if you're a woman. Criminals are looking for the weak and unarmed. And many of the criminals are FAFO that that woman, that black guy, that Latino guy, that Asian guy, that gay person, that older guy/gal aren't  as weak, as the criminals used to think that they were.  Those same people are getting their CCWs, getting trained and buying the guns, that fit their lifestyles. No this isn't the time to grab your guns and prepare. (Don't you remember what happened at Waco? How Janet Reno's ATF burned alive all of those people? Don't you remember what happened at Jonestown in Guyana? Both of those groups had the mindset of "Arm yourself and prepare". How did that work out for them?) Heroes, when things get bleak, always press forward, they don't run away and hide. I used to have the same ideas of get ready, strap up, get even more armed and get your food stores built up. (Haven't you ever seen videos on Preppers, and how real experts on being prepared, rate their preparations? Preppers don't do very well in those videos.) I'm one, of the very many, who isn't running away. More Americans aren't running away. On the contrary, more Americans are running towards the fight, and looking forward to that fight. It doesn't matter if the fight involves politics (the Men in girl's sports, locker rooms, bathrooms and showers issue, is being more fought against than ever before, and the Dems are losing on that fight)  Dems are watching, as every day, more black people, more Latinos, more young men,  more working class people, more single working mothers, are leaving the Democratic party. Money will no longer help the Dems. Harris had more billionaires backing her than Trump, but that didn't help that blue wall against that red tide, crumbling that blue wall on election night. I'm a big believer in the 2A. So yes, buy more guns. Get more training. But realize, that after decades of loosing, our side is fighting back, and winning! üòÅ
